name: chatgpt-memory-manager
description: 專業的 ChatGPT 記憶管理 Chrome 擴充套件，支援智能檢測、多格式匯出、歷史記錄管理和自動提醒功能

scripts.lint:format: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update
scripts.version:patch:auto: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update:full
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update
scripts.version:minor:auto: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update:full
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update
scripts.version:major:auto: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update:full

author: ChatGPT Memory Toolkit Team
